rooms.description: A spacious open-plan living area that seamlessly transitions from the entrance hall to a modern living space. The design follows Vastu principles by ensuring an unobstructed flow of energy, with ample natural light entering through large windows.

A dedicated home office designed with privacy in mind, using glass partitions to allow natural light while maintaining separation from the living area. The layout respects Vastu by orienting the desk towards the east for prosperity.
An elegantly designed master bedroom with a walk-in closet. The room is positioned to the south as per Vastu principles, ensuring calmness and relaxation.
A modern bathroom integrated with the master bedroom area. The placement is carefully considered to ensure proper drainage and privacy.

openings.description: A wide, inviting entrance that sets the tone for a luxury penthouse studio. The entrance incorporates sustainable materials and energy-efficient design.
Strategically placed to maximize natural light while adhering to Vastu guidelines, ensuring that the living space is well-lit throughout the day.
A dedicated access point leading to an elegantly designed swimming pool area integrated into the outdoor living space.
